author: benh
msg: Preemptive bug fix that might occur due to races with SchedulerProcess and MesosSchedulerDriver and ExecutorProcess and MesosExecutorDriver.

author: benh
msg: Adding some includes so that build works on Linux.
Also adding bin/master and bin/slaves to .gitignore file.

author: benh
msg: Bad form using 'yes' and 'no' in configure.ac, fails to actually define WITH_ZOOKEEPER correctly.

author: benh
msg: Bug fix due to calling realpath with too small of a buffer. Was causing segfaults and malloc failures on Mac OS X (no perceived bug on Linux).
